tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE loyalty_programs (
  loyalty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  program_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  purchase_date DATE,
  purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES loyalty_programs(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rewards (
  reward_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  loyalty_id INT NOT NULL,
  reward_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  reward_type VARCHAR(20),
  reward_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (loyalty_id) REFERENCES loyalty_programs(loyalty_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  loyalty_id INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (loyalty_id) REFERENCES loyalty_programs(loyalty_id)
);

CREATE TABLE loyalty_programs (
    loyalty_program_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR,
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR,
    join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    purchase_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rewards (
    reward_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    loyalty_program_id UUID,
    reward_type VARCHAR,
    reward_value DECIMAL,
    description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (loyalty_program_id) REFERENCES loyalty_programs(loyalty_program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    purchase_id UUID,
    customer_id UUID,
    transaction_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL,
    reward_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (purchase_id) REFERENCES purchases(purchase_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (reward_id) REFERENCES rewards(reward_id)
);
